FSCK_UDF(8) System Manager's Manual FSCK_UDF(8)

NAME

fsck_udf —
check a UDF filesystem

SYNOPSIS

fsck_udf [-b blocksize] [-L] [-p] [-D] devicePath

DESCRIPTION

The fsck_udf command examines a UDF filesystem residing on devicePath for correctness.

SEE ALSO

mount_udf(8)

BUGS

Currently does not perform any repairs.

HISTORY

The fsck_udf utility first appeared in Mac OS X.
March 10, 2008 Mac OS X 11.0
